Package co.cask.cdap.api.spark

Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JavaSparkProgram Defines an interface for User's Spark job written in Java
ScalaSparkProgram Defines an interface for User's Spark job written in Scala
Spark Defines an interface for the Spark job.
SparkContext Spark job execution context.
SparkProgram Defines an interface for User's Spark job.
SparkSpecification This class provides the specification for a Spark job.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSpark This abstract class provides a default implementation of Spark methods for easy extension.
SparkSpecification.Builder Builder for building SparkSpecification.
 

Package co.cask.cdap.api.spark Description

Defines APIs for defining Spark jobs in CDAP. Also provides a custom JavaSparkContext (for Java Spark jobs) and SparkContext (for Scala Spark jobs) which supports reading a Dataset to RDD and writing a RDD to Dataset
